summary:
New HD scars for Argonians
For both female and male
descriptionHtml:
So its time for another Argonian HD mod

This time its the Argonian scars i have fixed because as we all know they look terrible like if they were plastic coated.
BUT not anymore :)

I upgraded the diffuse map from 256x256 to 512x512 and fixed the shiny normal map and add a missing specular map
also the normal maps stays at vanilla size 256x256.

The textures works on both female and male because they share the same files :P :)

I have made One BIG picture with all the scars that shows before and after also made pictures of all the scars with Racemenu light and no light
So everyone is happy :)

IMPORTANT!!!

Keep in mind that the pictures you see i use Realvision enb combined with skylight enb Climates of tamriel and Enhanced light and FX.

Also Checkout my other mods

HD Argonian Mouth (Update coming soon)
